Description: Checks the existence, and optionally the accessibility, of a file.

Method: copy(Path source, Path target, CopyOption... options)
Description: Copy a file to a target file.
Creates a new directory.
Creates a new link (directory entry) for an existing file.

Method: createSymbolicLink(Path link, Path target, FileAttribute<?>... attrs)
Description: Creates a symbolic link to a target.
Deletes a file.
Deletes a file if it exists.

Method: getFileAttributeView(Path path, Class<V> type, LinkOption... options)
Description: Returns a file attribute view of a given type.
Returns the FileStore representing the file store where a file is located.
Returns an existing FileSystem created by this provider.
Return a Path object by converting the given URI.
Returns the URI scheme that identifies this provider.
Returns a list of the installed file system providers.
Tells whether or not a file is considered hidden.
Tests if two paths locate the same file.

Method: move(Path source, Path target, CopyOption... options)
Description: Move or rename a file to a target file.

Method: newAsynchronousFileChannel(Path path, Set<? extends OpenOption> options, ExecutorService executor, FileAttribute<?>... attrs)
Description: Opens or creates a file for reading and/or writing, returning an asynchronous file channel to access the file.

Method: newByteChannel(Path path, Set<? extends OpenOption> options, FileAttribute<?>... attrs)
Description: Opens or creates a file, returning a seekable byte channel to access the file.

Method: newDirectoryStream(Path dir, DirectoryStream.Filter<? super Path> filter)
Description: Opens a directory, returning a DirectoryStream to iterate over the entries in the directory.

Method: newFileChannel(Path path, Set<? extends OpenOption> options, FileAttribute<?>... attrs)
Description: Opens or creates a file for reading and/or writing, returning a file channel to access the file.
Constructs a new FileSystem to access the contents of a file as a file system.
Constructs a new FileSystem object identified by a URI.
Opens a file, returning an input stream to read from the file.
Opens or creates a file, returning an output stream that may be used to write bytes to the file.

Method: readAttributes(Path path, Class<A> type, LinkOption... options)
Description: Reads a file's attributes as a bulk operation.

Method: readAttributes(Path path, String attributes, LinkOption... options)
Description: Reads a set of file attributes as a bulk operation.
Reads the target of a symbolic link.

Method: setAttribute(Path path, String attribute, Object value, LinkOption... options)
Description: Sets the value of a file attribute.
Probes the given file to guess its content type.
